label: cascading_failure_01_dx_auth_audit_022
content:

### Events
- Closed another missing-ticket exception after revoke executed; evidence includes revoke timestamp and approver notes.
- Prepared weekly dashboard for auditors: MFA coverage 91.7%, break-glass uses 0 this week, open exceptions 2.
- Coordinated with app owner on SAML Audience mismatch; collected sample assertions and provided required EntityID.
- Validated token rotation KPIs after app teams responded; rotation failures trending downward.

### On Call

- On Call Status: Stable; exceptions reduced and audit dashboard delivered.
